headline: Moody's: Time To Reassess Lagging Ratings Agencies (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Moody's has underperformed major indexes over the past five years, with volatile growth. Read what led me to downgrade MCO stock to Hold.

headline: Rising Fiscal Deficits Drive Billions Into Credit
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Investors are showing signs of pulling money out of government bonds and plowing it into US and European company debt.
